    • canAfford

      public boolean canAfford(int woodCost, int stoneCost, int goldCost)
      Checks if the player can afford a cost in resources Precondition: woodCost, stoneCost, and goldCost are non-negative integers Postcondition: returns true if the player can afford the cost, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      woodCost - the wood cost to check
      stoneCost - the stone cost to check
      goldCost - the gold cost to check
      Returns:
      true if the player can afford the cost, false otherwise

    • reset

      public void reset(boolean keepGold)
      Resets the resource counts Precondition: N/A Postcondition: Resource counts are reset
      Parameters:
      keepGold - true to keep gold count, false to reset it
